title: Add animations and WhatsApp redirect on all interactive elements

requirements.text: Add entrance animations and micro-interactions throughout the entire website. This includes: fade-in/slide-up animations for sections as they enter the viewport (hero, stats bar, featured games, promotions, why choose us, footer), staggered card reveal animations for game cards and promo cards, hover scale/glow animations on all interactive cards and buttons, smooth transitions on the navigation bar, and animated text overlays in the hero carousel slides. Use CSS keyframes and/or Tailwind animation utilities consistently across all components.
acceptanceCriteria: Sections fade-in and slide-up as they enter the viewport
Game cards and promo cards have staggered reveal animations on load
All interactive cards and buttons have hover scale and glow effects
Navigation bar has smooth scroll and transition effects
Hero carousel slides have animated text overlays

requirements.text: Replace all link and button click handlers across the entire website so that every clickable element — including navigation links (Home, Sports, Casino, Promotions, About), Login button, Register button, Play Now buttons on game cards, Claim Now buttons on promo cards, footer quick links, footer game links, footer support links, social media icons, hero carousel CTA buttons, and stats bar items — opens the WhatsApp URL 'https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=917578900242&text=I%20want%20New%20Reddyanna%20%20Id%20!!!!!!!!!!!!!!' in a new tab. No internal routing or anchor navigation should remain; every interactive link/button must redirect to this WhatsApp URL.

quotes: on every link click navigate to open whatsapp link "https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=917578900242&text=I%20want%20New%20Reddyanna%20%20Id%20!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking any navigation link (Home, Sports, Casino, Promotions, About) opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking the Login button opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking the Register button opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking any Play Now button on game cards opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking any Claim Now button on promo cards opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking any footer link (quick links, game links, support links) opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking any social media icon opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking hero carousel CTA buttons opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
Clicking stats bar items opens the WhatsApp URL in a new tab
No internal routing or anchor navigation remains anywhere on the site

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
The WhatsApp URL must be exactly: https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=917578900242&text=I%20want%20New%20Reddyanna%20%20Id%20!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
All WhatsApp links must open in a new browser tab
nonGoals: Backend changes — the backend remains a placeholder with no functionality
Changing the existing color theme or layout structure
Adding real authentication or user accounts
